message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
